instruction: Create a meme about reading.
output: A meme with an image of a book and the caption "Nothing in the world can replace the feeling of getting lost in a good book".

instruction: Make predictions about the future of artificial intelligence.
output: AI is expected to make huge strides in the near future, allowing for processes to be automated with greater efficiency and accuracy. It is anticipated that AI will be of tremendous value to many industries, particularly in the areas of health care, education, manufacturing, and transportation. In addition, AI is expected to become more adept in understanding context and making autonomous decisions with little to no human involvement.

instruction: Suggest five strategies for time management.
output:
1. Make a daily to-do list and prioritize tasks. 
2. Set realistic goals and work towards them.
3. Take regular breaks to stay focused. 
4. Delegate tasks when possible. 
5. Eliminate distractions and focus on the task at hand.

instruction: Suggest a board game for a family to play on a rainy day.
output: One suggestion is the classic game Trouble. It is fun and easy to play, and it is suitable for ages 5 and up. The game has a classic “pop-o-matic” bubble in the center where players must roll their game pieces around the game board. The game can be adapted to fit everyone’s preferences.

instruction: Arrange the following list of items in descending order:
output: Potatoes, Rice, Noodles.

instruction: Provide an example of customer service email.
output:
Dear valued customer,

We thank you for your inquiry.  We value our customers and want to do everything we can to meet your expectations and provide you with a positive experience. 

At [Company], we strive to provide our customers with exceptional customer service and support. If you require any additional assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact us and we’ll do our best to help.

Thanks for being a customer!

Sincerely,
[Company] Customer Service Team

instruction:
Reword the following sentence without changing the meaning of the sentence:

The car needs to be washed.
output: The car requires washing.

instruction: Suggest a food recipe that is easy to prepare
output: A simple and delicious recipe is one-pan roasted vegetables. This is an excellent way to enjoy vegetables without any hassle. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit. Toss together one pound of any hearty vegetables (such as red potato wedges, parsnips, carrots, bell peppers, and onions), one tablespoon of olive oil, a pinch of salt and pepper, and any other spices of your choice. Place the mixture in a large roasting pan and bake for 25-30 minutes. Serve with your favorite sauce and enjoy!

instruction: Create a list of 5 tips to help people spend less money
output:
1. Make a budget and track all of your spending so you know where your money is going.
2. Choose one day each week to meal plan, shop for groceries, and cook. This will help you save money by not ordering takeout and reduce food waste by only buying what you need.
3. Take advantage of free entertainment such as borrowing books from the library or going for a nature walk.
4. Whenever possible, buy items in bulk to take advantage of discounts and save money over time.
5. Try to find creative ways to reuse any items you already have before purchasing something new.

instruction: Research the benefits of yoga and explain them in a few sentences
output: Yoga is an age-old practice that can benefit both physical and mental health. On the physical side, yoga can help increase strength and flexibility, improve posture, and provide a full body workout through a combination of different poses and breathing techniques. On the mental side, yoga can help reduce stress and anxiety, improve focus, aid in better sleep, and increase overall well-being. Yoga is also a great way to build and strengthen relationships with friends, family, and even yourself.

instruction: Explain what a business plan is
output: A business plan is a written document that outlines the objectives, strategies and competitive advantages of a business. It helps the business define goals, secure external investments, monitor progress, measure performance and manage resources. A business plan typically includes a description of the industry and market, an analysis of the business’s competitive position, an outline of the target customer segment, a plan for how the business will meet customer needs, a description of the business’s financial projections and a plan for how the business will operate and grow.

instruction: Generate a thesis statement to support the following statement: Social media is a distraction for students in college.
output: The use of social media can be a major distraction for students in college, impeding their performance and focus in the classroom and on assignments, and potentially affecting their overall academic success.

instruction: Distinguish the two events: Mr. Donald joined a theater group and Mr. Donald joined a theater performance.
output: The difference between the two events is that Mr. Donald joining a theater group implies that he has become a part of an ongoing community of thespians, while Mr. Donald joining a theater performance implies that he will be participating in an individual performance put on by the theater group.

instruction: Give a short description of the event that happened in the following sentence: The police broke up the protest.
output: The police intervened and dispersed the protesters who had gathered to demonstrate against a particular issue.

instruction: Write a 5-word tagline for the following product: a computer with advanced features.
output: Powerful, reliable computing experience.

instruction: Generate an example of a C++ program to print out "Hello World"
Describe a method for solving the following equation: 2x - y + 7 = 0
output: One method for solving the equation is to first add 7 to both sides of the equation, so that y is isolated on the left-hand side. Then, divide both sides by 2, including the y-term, to cancel out the coefficient of 2. The resulting equation will have a single variable equal to the solution of the original equation.

instruction: Generate a rhyming couplet for the word “moon”.
output:
The stars shine bright in the night,
Allowing the moon to take its light.

instruction: Given a vegetable name, describe its texture.
output: Celery has a crunchy texture with a slightly sweet and bitter taste.

instruction: Given a musical instrument, explain the way it is played.
output: The marimba is played with mallets, bar by bar. The right hand plays higher notes while the left hand plays lower notes. The player strikes the bars at various strengths to create different volumes.

instruction: Given a political leader name, describe one of their speeches.
output: Nelson Mandela's "I am Prepared to Die" speech focused on his journey in the anti-apartheid movement and stressed the importance of standing up for what you believe in. He spoke of the need for all South Africans to unite and oppose the apartheid system, and exposed the brutality of the oppressive regime.

instruction: Predict a consequence of the following action.
output: Bringing guns to school could lead to serious consequences such as expulsion, suspension, criminal charges, or even death.

instruction: Given an adjective, write a sentence that expresses it clearly.
output: He slammed the door shut, his face and words radiating rage.

instruction: Identify the type of sentence formed by the following text.
input: She warmed up the soup before serving.
output: Declarative sentence.

instruction: Given a country name, generate a tourist spot.
output: Helsinki is one of the famous tourist spots in Finland. It is renowned for its beautiful architecture and is home to many cultural events and attractions.
